sentence.Network_en: The film was shot in 17 days, a minuscule amount of time.
sentence.Network_cn: 这部电影仅用短短的17天便拍摄完毕。

sentence.Network_en: The next few years are only a minuscule part of the equation.
sentence.Network_cn: 今后的几年只是其中很短的一段时间.

sentence.Network_en: The human race only a minuscule portion of the earth's history.
sentence.Network_cn: 人类只有占有极小部分地球历史.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语书法的一些基本术语_圆体英文吧_百度贴吧 ... majuscule： 大写字母。 minuscule： 小写字母。 thick： 粗笔画。.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... minutia n 细微末节 minuscule a 极小的 mirror n 镜子.
Try to remember the good things ... perseverance n. 坚持不懈 minuscule adj. 极小的，微小的 obstacle n. 障碍.
minority n.少数minuscule n. 草写小字,小写字minibus n. 小型巴士,小型公共汽车

list.abs: ...并参考了罗马方块大写体,Roman square capitals,与卡洛林小写体,Carolingian minuscule,设计而成,整套字体富有动感与韵律,曾获,德国当代最佳印刷字体奖, 1963年,东德将友谊体.
...同时,加洛林小楷书写体经过图尔向外延展扩散,形成了一种字体优美清晰的,卡洛林小写字体,Carolingian minuscule,这种字体整齐秀丽,简便易学,影响巨大,拉丁文还在某种程度上帮助规范了各地区的民族语言,在今天的英语.

the minuscule elements , producing a lot less torque than a mechanical watch part , will never power a submarine through the blood vessels on a trip to the islets of Langerhans .这些微小元件的扭力比机械表的零件要小得多，实在不可能推动潜水艇在血管中游走，到胰脏内的兰氏小岛上一游。
Commissions may appear to be a minuscule expense ., 佣金看起来是很少的费用.

once formed , the new viruses percolate to the cell surface , pinch off inside minuscule bubbles of cell membraneand drift away , or else they continue reproducing until the cell finally bursts .新病毒一旦形成，不是逐渐渗透到细胞表面，随细胞膜上形成的小泡脱离细胞而去，就是不断复制，直到细胞终于胀破为止。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French, from Latin minuscula (littera) 'somewhat smaller (letter')

entry.def: If you describe something as minuscule, you mean that it is very small.

example.ex: The film was shot in 17 days, a minuscule amount of time.
example.tran: 这部电影仅用短短的17天便拍摄完毕。

means.word_mean: 1. the characters that were once kept in bottom half of a compositor's type case
2. a small cursive script developed from uncial between the 7th and 9th centuries and used in medieval manuscripts
1. of or relating to a small cursive script developed from uncial; 7th to 9th centuries

sentences.sentence: "e.e.cummings's poetry is written all in minuscule letters"

auth_sentence.content: Clouds would be sprayed with minuscule droplets of seawater.
auth_sentence.res_content: Clouds would be sprayed with minuscule droplets of seawater.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Clouds would be sprayed with minuscule droplets of seawater.

auth_sentence.content: The budget deficit was minuscule, as was inflation.
auth_sentence.res_content: The budget deficit was minuscule, as was inflation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The budget deficit was minuscule, as was inflation.

auth_sentence.content: The ratio would be minuscule to infinitesimally small.
auth_sentence.res_content: The ratio would be minuscule to infinitesimally small.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The ratio would be minuscule to infinitesimally small.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 显赫的;杰出的;有名的;优良的
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+min伸出,突出+ent……的→adj.显赫的;杰出的;有名的;优良的
im进入+min伸出,突出+ent……的→伸进来的→即将发生的
pro向前+min伸+ent……的→向前伸出→杰出的
pre前+eminent突出的→向前突出的→杰出的
